processing_structure.text: Check if n is divisible by i
If divisible, add i to sum

advice.text: Run the program with small test inputs and check the printed result matches the expected sum of divisors.
Trace variable values during execution: show n at start, and show i and sum inside the loop to watch how sum changes.

Insert temporary prints: display n before the loop, print i and the updated sum whenever i divides n, and print the final sum; test with inputs like 6 (expect 12), 1, and a prime number to confirm behavior.
